E

encodeToHexWithSalt(Long, String) - Static method in class com.hoovler.api.utils.GameHelper
Similar to a password-based encryption algorithm or a salted hash, the goal of this method is to create an ID-like string using the questionId and playerEmail such that the resulting string can be used to derive the QuestionId if given the playerEmail as the key.
encodeToHexWithSalt(String, String) - Static method in class com.hoovler.api.utils.GameHelper
Encode question player connection.
